derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent. (denoting a spindle-shaped figure): from French fusée 'spindleful', based on Latin fusus 'spindle'

means.word_mean: 1. a spirally grooved spindle in a clock that counteracts the diminishing power of the uncoiling mainspring
2. a colored flare used as a warning signal by trucks and trains
3. a friction match with a large head that will stay alight in the wind
4. any igniter that is used to initiate the burning of a propellant
